title: Education (Teacher Training College Boards) (Establishment) Order, 2015
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 281
Gazette dated Friday, 13th November, 2015
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.85 OF2015
The Education Act
(ActNo.23of2011)
The Education (Teacher Training College Boards)
(Establishment) Order, 2015
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsectionforty-fourofthe
EducationAct,2011,thefollowingOrderisherebymade:
1. ThisOrdermaybecitedastheEducation(TeacherTraining Title
CollegeBoards)(Establishment)Order,2015.
2. The Teacher Training College Board specified in the Establish-
mentof
ScheduleisestablishedasaTeacherTrainingCollegeBoard.
Teacher
Training
College
Board
